bike.description: FACT IS-X 11m carbon front triangle, 29" geometry, FACT IS construction, M5 rear triangle, tapered headtube, PF30 BB, ISCG '05 mounts, internal Command Post IR routing, 142+ dropouts, full cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 155mm travel

components.description: Bottle cage w/ SWAT Technology compatible (not included)
Custom Cane Creek Double Barrel Air, high/low speed comp and reb adj., climb switch, 215.9mm x 57.2mm
1-1/8 and 1-1/2" threadless, Campy style upper with 1-1/2" lower, cartridge bearings
SRAM, 10-speed, mid direct mount for Taco Blade, bottom pull (not on frame, in parts box)
Specialized Command Post IR, 3-position, internally routed adjustable height w/ air spring, remote operated, single bolt head, 30.9mm, 125mm travel
7050 hard anodized alloy collar, single bolt, 34.9mm
